carpet.rule.dropsIntoShulker.name: Drops Into Shulker
carpet.rule.dropsIntoShulker.desc: Automatically places dropped items into shulker boxes in player inventory. FALSE - Disable the feature. OFFHAND - Only check offhand shulker box. HOTBAR - Only check hotbar shulker boxes. INVENTORY - Only check inventory shulker boxes. ALL - Check all shulker boxes.
carpet.rule.explosionProtectionAreas.des: Enable to set explosion protection areas where explosions won't destroy blocks
carpetsctaddition.command.explosionprote: Explosion protection areas feature is not enabled, please enable explosionProtectionAreas in carpet settings first
Successfully added explosion protection area centered on player with radius %d
Successfully added explosion protection area from %s to %s
No explosion protection areas have been set
Index out of range, there are only %d explosion protection areas
Successfully removed explosion protection area with index %d
Successfully cleared all explosion protection areas
